name: OEM - Lenovo - Create Driver Pack Offline
description: This will run during WinPE, scan the device and download the latest available drivers and build a driver pack for the machine, or download and apply the standard Lenovo Driver Pack based on your options

versions.description: Description: This will run during WinPE, scan the device and download the latest available drivers and build a driver pack for the machine, or download and apply the standard Lenovo Driver Pack based on your options

options.name: IncludeGraphics
options.description: Do you want to include graphics drivers now, or wait until online for better scanning detection?

options.name: IncludeAudio
options.description: Do you want to include Audio at this stage, or wait until Full OS to run the Updater with better detection abilities

options.name: UseStandardLenovoDriverPack
options.description: This will look for and use the traditional driver pack.  If you choose this, the other options will be ignored.
